title: Ne'er Misser
content:
is crossbow etched in tiny print: 'ifn yer gonna miss, why dontchyae stop being a wally, and hit instead!

Hand Crossbow 15m Light

Ne'er Misser is one of the Hand Crossbow Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Ne'er Misser is a magical crossbow that deals force damage and can cast Magic Missile at level 3. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc.).
